document_data.mainbody:
Gond Sobor was a temple dedicated to Gond, the god of invention, located in the city of Almorel on the Lake of Mists in the Hordelands in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The temple was located along the Golden Way in eastern Almorel. It sat near the outer city wall in the shadow of the Gospoda to the west.
